name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Full Stack Developer with 10+ years of experience specializing in **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, **React**, and **Vue.js**. Proven expertise in delivering high-performance software solutions with a focus on agile methodologies and meticulous attention to detail. Highly proficient in developing and deploying cloud-native applications and committed to collaborative communication in team settings. Strong technical foundation complemented by practical experience in leading front-end and back-end development, ensuring scalable and maintainable architecture. Passionate about leveraging modern technologies to create systems that have a significant real-world impact.

experience.responsibilities:
• Designed and implemented scalable, full-stack solutions using **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **React (17–18)**, ensuring high-quality code and adherence to Agile methodology.
• Developed intuitive user interfaces in **Vue.js**, enhancing user experience and engagement through detailed attention to design and functionality.
• Led migrations and upgrades of applications, improving maintainability with modern development practices and introducing efficient communication strategies across teams.
• Collaborated with cross-functional teams for project requirements, demonstrating strong communication skills and ensuring project alignment with business goals.
• Built and supported applications with a focus on **detail-oriented** development, establishing a culture of excellence that directly contributed to timely project delivery.
• Conducted code reviews and implemented best practices for **React** and **Node.js**, fostering a collaborative and learning-focused environment.
• Adhered to collaborative development principles to ensure accountability and transparency in delivering solutions, driving in-depth discussions on feature enhancements and technical feasibility.

• Developed dynamic, user-focused front-end applications using **React (18)**, **Vue.js (3)**, and **TypeScript**, aligning with Agile methodology to enhance collaboration and deliver features efficiently.
• Led the architecture and implementation of scalable back-end services utilizing **Node.js (NestJS/Express)**, improving system throughput and maintainability for high-volume financial platforms.
• Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, ensuring clear communication of project requirements and remarkable attention to detail throughout the development lifecycle.
• Created responsive and performant user interfaces for financial dashboards and admin portals through expert usage of **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS**, ensuring an optimal user experience.
• Integrated real-time transaction monitoring and analytics dashboards leveraging **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling operations teams to track over **100K** transactions daily and generate actionable insights.
• Established a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, supporting high availability and real-time processing for transactions, alerts, and compliance workflows.
• Developed and orchestrated ETL pipelines with **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, facilitating batch and real-time data ingestion from multiple sources for up to **500 TB** of financial data.
• Implemented AI/ML-powered fraud detection systems using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, effectively analyzing patterns and identifying up to **95%** of suspicious activities in banking transactions.
• Built ML pipelines for various applications including credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, integrating real-time model inference into backend services using **MLflow** and **Airflow** for immediate decision-making.

Utilized **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **React** to design and implement scalable full-stack applications under an Agile methodology, with a focus on clear communication and a detail-oriented approach.
Engineered responsive frontend applications with **React** (18) and **Vue.js** (3), ensuring high performance and user engagement across various devices, aligning with mobile-first strategies.
Developed and optimized backend services using **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) for a global e-commerce platform, guaranteeing high availability and low latency in critical systems like checkout and order fulfillment, processing over **10,000** transactions per hour.
Collaborated in an Agile environment, enhancing team productivity by **25%** through effective communication and detailed documentation of project requirements.
Implemented best practices for code quality and maintainability, enabling a **50%** reduction in bug reports during the initial deployment phases.
Leveraged **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Redis** for efficient data management, achieving up to **99.9%** uptime during peak traffic periods and optimized data retrieval times.
Created dynamic user interfaces and enhanced SEO strategies using **Next.js** and **HTML5/CSS3**, improving site visibility and accessibility compliance with WCAG 2.1 standards.
Facilitated cross-functional collaboration to integrate user feedback into the development cycles, ensuring that product iterations accurately reflected customer needs.
Assured security through implementation of role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0**, protecting user data in compliance with GDPR standards.
